The latest EY Climate Risk Barometer reveals a concerning disconnect between reported climate efforts and carbon ambitions. While there are incremental improvements in reporting, more needs to be done to support climate commitments. 74% of surveyed companies are not including the quantitative impacts of climate risk in their disclosures, leaving a gap between climate impact and corporate strategy. Climate related reporting should become more than just a â€œtick boxâ€ exercise for finance teams if we expect to make real progress toward our decarbonization goals.
